health+2.title: Heartbound Fortitude
health+2.description: Channel inner strength to permanently increase maximum health by 1 heart, allowing you to endure greater challenges.

health+4.title: Warrior's Resilience
health+4.description: Harness battle-hardened vitality to increase maximum health by 2 hearts, significantly improving your survival in dangerous encounters.

health+8.title: Titan's Constitution
health+8.description: Manifest legendary toughness, increasing your maximum health by 4 hearts. Your life force grows to heroic proportions, allowing you to survive blows that would fell ordinary mortals.

minor_armor.title: Hardened Skin
minor_armor.description: Toughen your skin to gain +0.5 armor points, providing a small but helpful defense against physical attacks.

medium_armor.title: Iron Flesh Barrier
medium_armor.description: Develop resilient flesh that grants +1 armor point, noticeably reducing damage from enemy attacks.

minor_toughness.title: Resolute Defense
minor_toughness.description: Develop resilience against powerful attacks, gaining +0.5 armor toughness to better withstand heavy blows.

medium_toughness.title: Unyielding Bastion
medium_toughness.description: Master defensive techniques that grant +1 armor toughness, making your armor significantly more effective.

knockback_resistance+10%.title: Immovable Mountain Stance
knockback_resistance+10%.description: Root yourself like a mountain, gaining 10% resistance to being knocked back by enemy attacks and explosions.

minor_knockback_res.title: Steadfast Footing
minor_knockback_res.description: Plant your feet firmly to gain 3% knockback resistance, making you harder to displace in combat.

medium_knockback_res.title: Mountain's Stance
medium_knockback_res.description: Become as immovable as a mountain with 5% knockback resistance, better withstanding powerful attacks.

major_knockback_res.title: Unshakeable Colossus
major_knockback_res.description: Your stability becomes legendary with 15% knockback resistance. Even the mightiest blows barely move you from your chosen position, allowing perfect tactical control in combat.

explosion_knockback_resistance.title: Blast Anchoring
explosion_knockback_resistance.description: Your stance widens instinctively when explosions occur, granting 10% resistance to explosion knockback. While others are sent flying, you maintain your footing against devastating blasts.

major_explosion_resistance.title: Demolition Defiance
major_explosion_resistance.description: Your body instinctively braces against explosive force, granting 25% explosion knockback resistance. Stand firm in the face of detonations that would send others tumbling through the air.

healing_received.title: Vitality Amplification
healing_received.description: Your body resonates with life-giving energies, increasing healing received by 10%. Potions, regeneration effects, and other healing sources restore significantly more health, making recovery far more efficient.

major_healing.title: Miraculous Recovery
major_healing.description: Your cells respond extraordinarily to healing magic, increasing healing received by 20%. Recovery happens at astonishing rates as your body maximizes the effect of every healing potion and regenerative spell.

ghost_health+5.title: Ethereal Protection
ghost_health+5.description: Manifest a shield of spectral energy around your form, gaining 5 points of ghost health. This ethereal barrier absorbs damage before your physical body is harmed.

major_ghost_health.title: Spectral Aegis
major_ghost_health.description: Your connection to spectral energies strengthens dramatically, creating a powerful ethereal barrier of 10 ghost health points. This supernatural shield absorbs significant damage before your physical form takes any harm.

minor_dodge.title: Swift Evasion
minor_dodge.description: Develop basic evasive maneuvers, gaining a 3% chance to completely avoid incoming attacks.

magic_protection+5.title: Mystic Barrier
magic_protection+5.description: Weave protective enchantments into your very essence, gaining 5 points of magic protection. Arcane defenses shield your body and soul from magical harm of all kinds.

major_magic_protection.title: Arcane Dampening Field
major_magic_protection.description: Your body develops powerful counter-resonance to magical energies, granting 10 points of magic protection. Hostile spells fizzle and weaken as they approach you, drastically reducing arcane damage of all types.

eldritch_spell_power.title: Forbidden Knowledge Wielder
eldritch_spell_power.description: Your mind has glimpsed beyond the veil of reality, increasing eldritch spell power by 5%. Channel cosmic forces with greater potency as your understanding of impossible geometries grows deeper.

ender_magic_resist.title: Teleportation Anchor
ender_magic_resist.description: Your physical form resists spatial manipulation, granting 5% resistance to ender magic. Your position in reality becomes more fixed, making you less vulnerable to teleportation effects and void energies.

blood_magic_resist.title: Vitae Warding
blood_magic_resist.description: Your life essence resists external manipulation, gaining 5% resistance to blood magic. Crimson spells struggle to affect your well-protected vital force, significantly reducing their harmful effects.

fire_magic_resist.title: Flame-Touched Soul
fire_magic_resist.description: Your essence gains properties of the infernal planes, providing 5% resistance to fire magic. Magical flames diminish as they approach your naturally heat-resistant form.

ice_magic_resist.title: Frostborn Resilience
ice_magic_resist.description: Your inner fire cannot be extinguished by winter's grasp, providing 5% resistance to ice magic. Freezing spells struggle to slow your movements or chill your core as your body maintains its vital heat.

lightning_magic_resist.title: Stormchild's Immunity
lightning_magic_resist.description: Electrical energies flow harmlessly through your adapted nervous system, granting 5% resistance to lightning magic. Your body has learned to channel and disperse magical electricity rather than succumbing to its shocking power.

spell_resist+10%.title: Arcane Warding
spell_resist+10%.description: Develop protective countermeasures against hostile magic, gaining 10% resistance to all spells. Your aura deflects and disperses incoming magical energies, reducing their harmful effects.

ether_resistance.title: Planar Barrier
ether_resistance.description: Your body develops a mystical resistance to interdimensional forces, gaining 10% ether resistance. Void energies and planar distortions have less effect on you, reducing damage from these otherworldly sources.

max_absorption.title: Golden Vitality Barrier
max_absorption.description: Your body can sustain more powerful absorption effects, increasing maximum absorption by 2 hearts. Golden apples and similar items provide significantly more protective shielding when consumed.

evocation_magic_resist.title: Binding Disruptor
evocation_magic_resist.description: Your aura naturally disrupts conjuration energies, providing 5% resistance to evocation magic. Summoned creatures find it harder to maintain their form in your presence, and binding spells slip away like water.

holy_magic_resist.title: Divine Judgment Evasion
holy_magic_resist.description: Your spirit exists in a moral gray area that confounds divine energies, granting 5% resistance to holy magic. Sacred light struggles to judge what it cannot clearly perceive, reducing its impact on your complex soul.

nature_magic_resist.title: Wild Harmony
nature_magic_resist.description: Your spiritual connection with the natural world provides 5% resistance to nature magic. Primal forces recognize you as part of their domain rather than an intruder to be expelled or consumed.

vitality_recovery.title: Enhanced Vitality
vitality_recovery.description: Your body's natural healing processes become more efficient, increasing natural health regeneration by 15%. Recover from injuries faster as your enhanced metabolism repairs damage at an accelerated rate.

exposure_tactics.title: Exposure Tactics
exposure_tactics.description: Force enemies into exposed positions, reducing their ranged resistance by 8%. Your tactical strikes compromise their ability to defend against incoming projectiles.

projectile_avoidance.title: Projectile Awareness
projectile_avoidance.description: Train your reflexes to subconsciously avoid projectiles, reducing ranged damage by 8%. Your body instinctively shifts to minimize exposure to incoming arrows and other missiles.

combat_training.title: Combat Hardening
combat_training.description: Master defensive combat techniques to reduce melee damage taken by 2%. Your practiced movements deflect and absorb impacts, turning potentially lethal blows into glancing hits.

resilience_training.title: Physical Resilience
resilience_training.description: Toughen your body through rigorous training, reducing all incoming damage by 5%. Your hardened physique withstands impacts that would severely injure others.
